short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save references to Zotero from your web browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this extension to save references from your web browser to the Juris-M reference manager. It is for all practical purposes identical to the Zotero Connector, but tweaked to communicate instead with your Juris-M client.

This extension will not interfere with a separately installed copy of Zotero Connector.
